summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the acquisition of right of way necessary for the improvement of College Way North connecting North 92nd Street in the vicinity of Wallingford avenue North with existing College Way North at North 95th Street and for the necessary expenses of the Law and Engineering Departments in connection with such purchase or any subsequent condemnation proceedings; making an appropriation from the Arterial Development fund therefor; and abandoning the unexpended and unencumbered balances remaining in Ordinance No. 105511.
